post.description:
Create one or more brokers to a maximum of 100 per request.
Required fields :- brokerName,brokerTicker,brokerType,brokerIssuerId. 
Users needs to have permissions under permType='brkrMaint' for using this API.
(-- api-linter: core::0233::http-uri-suffix=disabled
 aip.dev/not-precedent:It is a top level resource so ending uri with
 verbNoun :batchCreateBrokers --)

get.description: Searches brokers based on the input query.

parameters.description: A unique identifier for this request.
parameters.name: VND.com.blackrock.Request-ID

parameters.description: Timestamp assigned to this request at origin, in "HTTP-date" format as defined by RFC 7231.
parameters.name: VND.com.blackrock.Origin-Timestamp

parameters.description: Search string (atleast two characters).
parameters.name: search

parameters.description:
Represents search type.

 - SEARCH_TYPE_UNSPECIFIED: The API will default to the BROKER type
 - SEARCH_TYPE_BROKER: This is the default value
Fields searched - brokerTicker,brokerName.
 - SEARCH_TYPE_ISSUER: Fields searched - issuer.
 - SEARCH_TYPE_LEI: Fields searched - legal entity identifier.
parameters.name: searchType

parameters.description: Load Defunct Flag - If true , will load all (including defuncts) , else will only load non defunct data.
parameters.name: loadDefunct

parameters.description:
The maximum value is 100; values above 100 will be coerced to 100
If unspecified, the default value to return is 100
The maximum number of Brokers to return (Pagination is not supported currently).
parameters.name: pageSize

parameters.description: A page token, received from a previous call (Pagination is not supported currently).
parameters.name: pageToken

400.description: Aladdin速 will not process the request due to an apparent client error.

code.description: A short mnemonic reference code for the error.

message.description: A human readable description of the error.

VND.com.blackrock.Response-ID.description: A Unique Identifier for this response.

VND.com.blackrock.Response-Timestamp.description: Timestamp assigned to this response, in "HTTP-date" format as defined by RFC 7231.

Any.description:
`Any` contains an arbitrary serialized message along with a
URL that describes the type of the serialized message

@type.description: A URL/resource name that uniquely identifies the type of the serialized message.

enumsActionType.description:
Represents type of validation being performed.

 - ACTION_TYPE_UNSPECIFIED: Reserved value.
 - ACTION_TYPE_CREATE: Validation for create request.
 - ACTION_TYPE_UPDATE: Validation for update request.

rpcStatus.description:
The `Status` type defines a logical error model that is suitable for
different programming environments, including REST APIs and RPC APIs. It is
used by [gRPC](https://github.com/grpc). Each `Status` message contains
three pieces of data: error code, error message, and error details.

You can find out more about this error model and how to work with it in the
[API Design Guide](https://cloud.google.com/apis/design/errors).

code.description: The status code, which should be an enum value of [google.rpc.Code][google.rpc.Code].

message.description:
A developer-facing error message, which should be in English. Any
user-facing error message should be localized and sent in the
[google.rpc.Status.details][google.rpc.Status.details] field, or localized by the client.

details.description:
A list of messages that carry the error details.  There is a common set of
message types for APIs to use.

requests.description:
A maximum of 100 brokers can be created in a batch.
Broker Id, Broker Name, Broker Issuer Id, Broker Type are mandatory in all create requests.
Broker Code , Broker External Organization ID should not be provided in any create request
Broker Portfolio Id should only be provided when Broker Type is PORTFOLIO.
requests.title: Create Brokers Request

requests.description:
A maximum of 100 brokers can be updated in a batch.
Broker Id, Broker Name, Broker Issuer Id, Broker Type, Broker Code are mandatory in all update requests.
Broker External Organization ID, Broker Portfolio Id should not be provided in any update request.
requests.title: Update Brokers Request

requests.description: A maximum of 100 brokers can be validated in a batch.
requests.title: Validate Brokers Request

actionType.description: Enum that determines whether the request is a create request or an update request, to perform validation accordingly.
actionType.title: ActionType enum

status.description: The status of the operation in case of failure/success.

brokerValidation.description: Represents the validation associated with the broker records.

v1Broker.description:
A trade executed through Aladdin is a transaction that occurred between a portfolio and 'other' party. 
Broker represents the 'other' participant in a trade.

id.description:
Resources must have a 'id' field.
Name describes the computer or human assigned resource identifier.
Broker code.

brokerExternalOrganisationId.title:
External organisation.
(-- api-linter: core::0124::required-reference=disabled
 aip.dev/not-precedent: We need to do this because the resource it should reference has not been created. --)

legalEntityId.description:
LEI - Legal Entity Identifier. 
Refers to ticker from issuer table - Value is mapped and returned , not to be entered by the user.

active.description: active- Flag that indicates whether the counterparty is in active/defunct state.

v1BrokerQuery.description: The query required to perform a filter query.

brokerTickers.description: Broker ticker for which broker desk data is to be retrieved.

defunct.description: Defunct flag - to load only defunct counterparties.

query.description: Query used to filter brokers, such as broker ticker.
query.title: Filter Brokers Query

pageSize.description:
The maximum number of Brokers to return. The service may
return fewer than this value. If unspecified i.e 0, then complete list of
Brokers will be returned.

pageToken.description:
A page token, received from a previous 'FilterBrokers' call.
Provide this to retrieve the subsequent page.

When paginating, all other parameters provided to
'FilterBrokers' must match the call that provided the page
token.

nextPageToken.description:
A token, which can be sent as 'page_token' to retrieve the next page.
If this field is omitted, there are no subsequent pages.
A token, which can be sent as 'page_token' to retrieve the next page(Pagination is not supported currently).

v1SearchType.description:
Represents type of search being performed.

 - SEARCH_TYPE_UNSPECIFIED: The API will default to the BROKER type
 - SEARCH_TYPE_BROKER: This is the default value
Fields searched - brokerTicker,brokerName.
 - SEARCH_TYPE_ISSUER: Fields searched - issuer.
 - SEARCH_TYPE_LEI: Fields searched - legal entity identifier.

v1UpdateBrokerRequest.title:
The request message for BrokerAPI.UpdateBroker.
(-- api-linter: core::0134::request-mask-required=disabled
    aip.dev/not-precedent: Update masks are not being used --)

OAuth2AccessCode.description: This API uses OAuth 2.0 with the access code flow.

scopes.investment_operations.reference_data.bro: This grants access to all endpoints in the investment_operations.reference_data.broker.v1.Broker API
scopes.offline_access: This keeps you signed in to the app, even when you are not using it.

OAuth2ClientCredentials.description: This API uses OAuth 2.0 with the client credentials flow.

scopes.investment_operations.reference_data.bro: This grants access to all endpoints in the investment_operations.reference_data.broker.v1.Broker API
scopes.offline_access: This keeps you signed in to the app, even when you are not using it.
